item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: What can we expect from G7 Mainnet? Well, the private testnet saw:
6M transactions 1.4K contracts deployed Hundreds of web3 teams participating
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

What can we expect from G7 Mainnet? Well, the private testnet saw:

6M transactions
1.4K contracts deployed

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: The G7 mainnet is built from the ground up to meet the needs of game developers in the Ethereum ecosystem.
All existing G7 infra is migrating to the new chain, including 600K gamer identities.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
The G7 mainnet is built from the ground up to meet the needs of game developers in the Ethereum ecosystem.

All existing G7 infra is migrating to the new chain, including 600K gamer identities.

item.title:
G7 Network from @G7_DAO is live on mainnet today.
G7 is the @Arbitrum L3 where devs get top-tier onchain gaming infrastructure.
G7 is launching with the full Arbitrum stack, with @circle‚Äôs Bridged USDC Standard integration from Conduit Marketplace.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: If Derive wasn't an appchain, part of the revenue made will instead be paid in sequencing fees to the underlying blockchain.
But Derive will internalize all the revenue from a whopping $3.7B in just a monthly trading volume.
Delusioners still argue on the appchain future while the need is crystal clear.
Good stuff, Conduit üëè
item.dc:creator: @TheDeFISaint
item.description:
If Derive wasn't an appchain, part of the revenue made will instead be paid in sequencing fees to the underlying blockchain.

But Derive will internalize all the revenue from a whopping $3.7B in just a monthly trading volume.

Delusioners still argue on the appchain future while the need is crystal clear.

Good stuff, Conduit üëè

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Derive is scaling fast with @conduitxyz:
‚Ä¢ $1.4B+ weekly trading volume ‚Ä¢ Daily DA costs cut from 1.3 ETH to 0.06 ETH ‚Ä¢ Gas limit increased from 30M to 400M ‚Ä¢ Max positions per trader doubled to 128
Read more üëá
item.dc:creator: @derivexyz
item.description:
Derive is scaling fast with @conduitxyz:

‚Ä¢ $1.4B+ weekly trading volume
‚Ä¢ Daily DA costs cut from 1.3 ETH to 0.06 ETH
‚Ä¢ Gas limit increased from 30M to 400M
‚Ä¢ Max positions per trader doubled to 128

Read more üëá

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1885009990798221712#m

item.title:

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: ‚ÄúMost teams don‚Äôt have the expertise to run their own rollup, so they need to be able to trust their rollup platform. That‚Äôs what we have with Conduit. It‚Äôs a team of experts we can always rely on.‚Äù - Derive Head of Engineering @josh_pwrk
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: ‚ÄúMost teams don‚Äôt have the expertise to run their own rollup, so they need to be able to trust their rollup platform. That‚Äôs what we have with Conduit. It‚Äôs a team of experts we can always rely on.‚Äù - Derive Head of Engineering @josh_pwrk

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Conduit Bundler lets Derive provide a CEX-like UX for traders ‚Äì no having to sign for each individual transaction they make.
The bundler lives on the same Conduit platform as the rest of Derive‚Äôs rollup infra, reducing operational overhead.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Conduit Bundler lets Derive provide a CEX-like UX for traders ‚Äì no having to sign for each individual transaction they make.

The bundler lives on the same Conduit platform as the rest of Derive‚Äôs rollup infra, reducing operational overhead.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Derive‚Äôs DA costs were out of control on Ethereum. We switched them to Celestia and brought DA costs down from a daily average of 1.3 ETH to 0.06 ETH.
A fast, painless migration handled by Conduit led to 95% savings for Derive.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Derive‚Äôs DA costs were out of control on Ethereum. We switched them to Celestia and brought DA costs down from a daily average of 1.3 ETH to 0.06 ETH.

A fast, painless migration handled by Conduit led to 95% savings for Derive.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: We upped Derive‚Äôs gas limit so that traders can now have twice as many active positions at once.
This lets market makers be many multiples more capital efficient, bringing more of them to the platform so that users get tighter spreads.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
We upped Derive‚Äôs gas limit so that traders can now have twice as many active positions at once.

This lets market makers be many multiples more capital efficient, bringing more of them to the platform so that users get tighter spreads.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: As Derive‚Äôs rollup partner, we take infra off their plate so they can focus on building the best derivatives DEX possible.
What does that look like?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
